entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow this morning. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
